DataElement.preferredName: Image Finding Largest Cyst Depth CM Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numeric response to capture the measured depth in cm from skin surface to center of largest cyst found in the study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Distinguishing qualities of the greatest sized cyst found in an imaging study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Clinical manifestations that can be either objective when observed by a physician, or subjective when perceived by the patient.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Greatest in size of those under consideration.:(sist) A sac or capsule filled with fluid.

Concepts.definition: Greatest in size of those under consideration.
A sac-like closed membranous structure that may be empty or contain fluid or amorphous material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/27/09 - released for reuse by DCP.  3/20/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeric response to capture the depth from skin to the center of the cyst. [Manually-curated]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Depth; extent downward or inward.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: The extent downward or inward; the perpendicular measurement from the surface downward to determine deepness.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor.  3/20/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Depth from skin to center of
ReferenceDocuments.description: Depth from skin to center of cyst (to nearest 0.5 cm)

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/14/13 Removed caBIG-ACRIN CSI; added equivalent modality and Under Review ECOG-ACRIN CSI. jc  10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor; added "Image Finding" from DEC to CDE long name.  3/20/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.
